newsitem.title: USA: HGCA daily agri-money rates - Oct 31.
newsitem.headline: HGCA daily agri-money rates - Oct 31.

text.p: Green Rate Ref Period 1 Day 3 Day Forecast Current
31 Oct 21-31 Oct 31 Oct n/a G.Rate rate in
AMR RMG RMG RMG 1 Nov effect

On the basis of exchange rates from 21-31 October, the UK monetary gap is +5.574 percent. Since any revaluation of the UK green rate is non-appreciable and sterling has completed its single confirmation period, UK green rate will be revalued to 0.809915 on 1 November by halving its RMG. On the basis of exchange rates over the same period, the average RMG for the Irish punt has also remained above +5 percent at +5.733 percent. Thus, the Irish punt will enter its fifth and last confirmation period on 1 November. All currencies with negative RMGs will be devalued by reducing their monetary gaps to zero. Thus on the basis of exchange rates from 21-31 October, the Belgian, German, Dutch and Austrian green rates will be devalued to 39.6411, 1.92441, 2.15852 and 13.5396 per ecu, respectively, as from tomorrow. The next confirmation period will run from 1 to 10 November.
